transcript.text: I stumbled upon cue back in November of
2017 and very glad that I did I was
initially somewhat skeptical but I'm
someone who's for the last thirty years
done plenty of research on what is
really going on in our world who pulls
the strings and why things are the way
they are in other words war division and
poverty
so when Q came on the scene I was really
intrigued by the nature of the drums as
they are known and the questioning
method which I believe is the Socratic
method which really gets people to start
questioning and researching and
questioning their reality so I loved
that about it and over the months and
now they've been over 1,700 drops I
believe I have become utterly convinced
that Q is not only very real but very
relevant to what is going on in the
world today and one thing that really
struck me in the beginning was a drop
about a prayer that was said every
morning in the Oval Office by the Trump
team and it's a prayer dedicated to John
F Kennedy and that blew me away I have
to say and got my attention
big time since then there have been so
many things about the Q drops that I
just come Wow how did they know that so
it's it's Q is intelligent in more
senses than one intelligent in the sense
of the Socratic method but intelligence
as in very high-level military
intelligence it's become very clear
because many many of the hints and drops
are of things that happened on the world
stage around North Korea and the
European Union many things that couldn't
have known these things unless there was
this high-level military intelligence
queue clearances maybe that's why it's
called queue so I'm utterly convinced at
this time I love the conversations on
the boards around queue very intelligent
conversation very warm-hearted people
discussion that is exciting and full of
hope so the queue to me represents
something so adult irrelevant right now
and it's about freedom versus tyranny
really that is the bottom line
questioning our reality questioning
everything we've been told that's real
because most of it isn't and if we're
going to free ourselves we do have to
know the truth so I believe that's where
Q comes in
